title: Best offense in NFL? QB with highest expectations? Bills HC Sean McDermott; Broncos S Justin Simmons
itunes:title: Best offense in NFL? QB with highest expectations? Bills HC Sean McDermott; Broncos S Justin Simmons
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins examining if the Cincinnati Bengals have the best offense in the league. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty look around the league and compare the Bengals offense to other elite offenses like the Buffalo Bills, Kansas City Chiefs and Los Angeles Chargers. Next, the GMFB panel analyzes if Josh Allen has the highest of expectations this season and then they’re joined by Bills head coach Sean McDermott and he talks about the it factor of Josh Allen, the addition of Von Miller and the 82-yard-punt. Later, they’re joined by Broncos S Justin Simmons and he talks about being inside the top-100 of NFL players, facing against Russell Wilson in practice, and the competitive AFC West. The show finishes up being joined by newly retired NFL player Beau Allen and he talks about what he’ll miss the most, the Super Bowl victory in his hometown, and going from Philadelphia to New England.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
